description: Student teaching provides the best possible introduction to the teaching experience.
Student teachers practice all classroom teaching skills required to assure competency to
begin their first year of teaching. Students are assigned to a full-time internship in
schools under the guidance of a competent cooperating teacher and supervised by faculty
from both the content area department and the Education Department. Minimum of 6-12
full-time weeks teaching. Only student teachers may enroll: seniors or college graduates
seeking an additional license. Offered each semester and Interim. Cannot be taken
concurrently with EDUC 389 or EDUC 390. Prerequisite: completion of EDUC 389 or EDUC 390
